Want to get more involved with the Loco team, but don't know how to do so? Below is a list of necessary jobs that anyone is welcome to volunteer for. If you only want to volunteer for a job once, that is perfectly fine. If you decide that you want to be in charge of a specific job, then feel free to let us know!

Have any questions? You can always ask us on IRC (#ubuntu-chicago), and we'll be happy to help.

Please feel free to add any other jobs that you can think of!

=== Available Volunteer Jobs ===

1. Update meeting "Minutes" after each meeting

2. Lead the discussions held during meetings

3. Setup locations for in-person meetings

4. Help update Wiki pages when they need attention

=== Assigned Jobs (Currently None) ===
